summary: I STARTED MY 2010 FUSION AND BEGAN BACKING OUT OF THE DRIVEWAY WHEN THE ALERT CHIME STARTED AND DASH WARNING FOR "POWER STEERING ASSIST FAILURE" DISPLAYED.  LOST STEERING CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE.  WAS ABLE TO SLOWLY CREEP THE VEHICLE TO THE CURB.  TURNED IGNITION OFF, BACK ON AND ERROR RESET.  SAME PROBLEM RECURRED THE FOLLOWING DAY, AGAIN CORRECTED BY TURNING IGNITION OFF, THEN BACK ON.  HAVE NOT SOUGHT REPAIRS AS OF YET.
